description: Delete a calendar event by its ID

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: The ID of the event to be deleted

description: Create an event with details from parameters provided by user

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date of the event in dd-mm-yyyy format

parameters.name: summary
parameters.description: A brief summary of the event from user's prompt

description: Replace an existing event with parameters provided by user

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: The ID of the event to replace.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The new title of the event

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The new date of the event in dd-mm-yyyy format

parameters.name: summary
parameters.description: A new brief summary of the event from new user's prompt
